remarks: Lemma for isomorphism H of a lattice meet.  (Contributed by NM, 30-Mar-2014.)  (New usage is discouraged.)
statement:
dihmeetc.b $e |- B = ( Base ` K ) $.
dihmeetc.l $e |- .<_ = ( le ` K ) $.
dihmeetc.m $e |- ./\ = ( meet ` K ) $.
dihmeetc.h $e |- H = ( LHyp ` K ) $.
dihmeetc.i $e |- I = ( ( DIsoH ` K ) ` W ) $.
dihmeetbclemN $p |- ( ( ( K e. HL /\ W e. H ) /\ ( X e. B /\ Y e. B ) /\ ( X ./\ Y ) .<_ W ) -> ( I ` ( X ./\ Y ) ) = ( ( ( I ` X ) i^i ( I ` Y ) ) i^i ( I ` W ) ) ) $.
